kubejs.ponder.introduction.text_1: Thank you for purchasing the AUTOMATON CQ1503
kubejs.ponder.introduction.text_2: We hope it brings you many years of good use!
kubejs.ponder.introduction.text_3: Version CQ1503 brings all new features!
kubejs.ponder.introduction.text_4: No need for maintenance, fuel, or down time! Made with indestructible materials
kubejs.ponder.jump.text_2: It can jump across wide gaps
kubejs.ponder.stone.text_1: This is a cobblestone generator! But you probably already knew how that works
kubejs.ponder.stone.text_2: But did you know you can make a stone generator too?
kubejs.ponder.stone.text_3: By having lava flow onto the top of water it generates stone!
kubejs.ponder.tools.text_1: The automaton comes with it's own Personal Assembler!
kubejs.ponder.tools.text_2: Open by pressing the V key
kubejs.ponder.tools.text_3: The automaton is able to break and place any block from up to 30 blocks away!
ptdye.ponder.tag.tutorial.description: Learn 'how to' in this overhauled modpack
